name: Block Legend Block Classic
description:
Block Legend is a tetris style exciting block puzzle game. Move blocks to fill up the square and collect block pieces to get Maximum score. One of the most addictive and fun Puzzles that will get your brain working daily also slide Puzzle FeverMost Beloved Puzzle

HOW TO PLAY

- Sliding Puzzles, Just move and move!
- Puzzle Games, Thought-provoking fun.
- Touch to the blocks to rotate it
- Try to fit them all row or Column
- Don't worry! No time limits!
- Simple and Addictive Puzzle Game

This is a classic yet innovative game!
Download it and you will love this game!
